subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Jets matched the Cleveland Browns’ offer sheet to safety Abram Elam, keeping him in their secondary. Elam was an unrestricted free agent who started nine games last season, his second with the Jets. Browns Coach Eric Mangini already has signed four of his former Jets players, and Cleveland signed Elam to an offer sheet last week.
